alert.note: Alert for Carter; Jefferson; Love (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:42PM CDT until June 17 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... Love County in southern Oklahoma... Carter County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 942 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Healdton to 4 miles east of Grady to near Oscar, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Marietta, Lone Grove, Healdton, Wilson, Dickson, Ringling, Springer, Thackerville, Gene Autry, Leon, Overbrook, Rubottom, Lake Murray, Burneyville, Grady, Oscar, Cornish, Courtney, and Petersburg. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
